thread.title: Globe Express Services reinforces presence in US market via opening of new office in Houston
thread.title_full: Globe Express Services reinforces presence in US market via opening of new office in Houston | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Globe Express Services reinforces presence in US market via opening of new office in Houston
text:
(MENAFN Press) August 04, 2015

Globe Express Services has revealed the opening of its new office in Houston, Texas to cater to the growing demand for comprehensive logistics services in the United States (US). The opening of the new Houston office will allow GES to strengthen its market foothold as it continues to expand its presence in key global markets to provide integrated, tailor-made and end-to-end logistics solutions.

GES Houston's key logistics services will be delivered by a team of professional and highly trained personnel to meet its clients' requirements in a timely manner. The new office's knowledge and deep understanding of the oil and gas sector is one of its strongest attributes that will give the company a competitive edge in the US market. Its portfolio of services for the oil and gas industry ranges from domestic trucking, multi-vendor consolidation to large project forwarding in areas such as pipeline fittings and oversized heavy steel components for air and ocean freight. 

Mustapha Kawam, President & CEO, Globe Express Services, said, "The opening of our new office in Houston will further reinforce our presence in the flourishing US logistics market, which allows us to be part of its continuing growth while at the same time giving us the advantage of capitalizing on its many opportunities. We will continue to remain steadfast in our commitment to provide our clients with world-class high quality logistics services--ensuring the timely delivery and smooth flow of goods anytime, anywhere." 


About Globe Express Services 
Globe Express Services offers a robust, well-rounded suite of logistics services to companies doing business in Asia, Europe, the Middle East, North America, Latin America and around the world. Since 1974, we have enabled our clients' supply chain success through ocean & air freight forwarding, overland transport, Customs brokerage & compliance consulting, cargo consolidation, warehousing & distribution, specialty cargo handling, and project logistics. Our state-of-the-art technology platform provides outstanding visibility, flexibility and customization potential, while our highly trained personnel share a commitment to providing the ultimate customer service. For more information, please visit www.globeexpress.com.
